mapper.select: select pid, type, link, uid, tid, cid, gid, state, create_date, update_date from minibox.mb_photo where pid = #{pid}
select pid, type, link, uid, tid, cid, gid, state, create_date, update_date from minibox.mb_photo limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into minibox.mb_photo(type, link, uid, tid, cid, gid) values (#{type}, #{photoLink}, #{uid}, #{tid}, #{cid}, #{gid})

insert into minibox.mb_photo(type, link, uid, tid, cid, gid) values
(#{entity.type}, #{entity.photoLink}, #{entity.uid}, #{entity.tid}, #{entity.cid}, #{entity.gid})

insert into minibox.mb_photo(type, link, uid, tid, cid, gid, state, create_date, update_date) values
(#{entity.type}, #{entity.link}, #{entity.uid}, #{entity.tid}, #{entity.cid}, #{entity.gid}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.createDate}, #{entity.updateDate})
on duplicate key update type = values(type) , link = values(link) , uid = values(uid) , tid = values(tid) , cid = values(cid) , gid = values(gid) , state = values(state) , create_date = values(create_date) , update_date = values(update_date)
mapper.update:
update minibox.mb_photo
type = #{type},
link = #{link},
uid = #{uid},
tid = #{tid},
cid = #{cid},
gid = #{gid},
state = #{state},
create_date = #{createDate},
update_date = #{updateDate},
where pid = #{pid}
